DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To compare incidence chronic pain 3 month among adult undergo craniotomy receive two different dos pregabalin receive placebo .
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis : Perioperative pregabalin reduce incidence chronic post-operative pain , reduce opioid consumption , opioid-related side effect , hospital length stay compare placebo patient undergo elective craniotomy . Methods : 316 adult ( 18-65y ) , ASA I-III , undergo elective craniotomy randomize receive : 100mg 150mg pregabalin placebo pre-operatively 50mg 75mg placebo twice daily 14 post-operative day . NRS pain score , opioid consumption side effect assess 48h , long-term pain day 7 , 14 , 30 , 90 . The primary analysis involve comparison 2 treatment group together vs. placebo . A stepwise method use evaluate pairwise comparison . Outcomes : The primary outcome incidence chronic post-craniotomy pain 3 mo . Important secondary outcome : neuropathic component pain 3 mos. , total opioid consumption first 24h , incidence severity opioid-related side effect day 1 , 2 7 .
